content: DBS Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Jul 2019Hi there, for POSB/DBS, other than DBS Altitude, are there any other cards whose points/miles don't expire?Hi there, for POSB/DBS, other than DBS Altitude, are there any other cards whose points/miles don't expire?1 answerAnswerBump0

God of WisdomAnswered on 02 Jul 2019Hi, unforunately only the Altitude line of cards will earn DBS points that never expire.You may want to consider CitiPremier Miles as they also earn miles that never expire and have a wider range of transfer partners.0 comments4
